name: 3-D Ultra Pinball
summary:
The original 3-D Ultra Pinball game was released in 1995. 
This game is based on the space simulation game, Outpost. 
There are three tables named Colony, Command Post, and Mine. 
Each table holds a set of five challenges. 
Smaller "mini-tables" are featured with their own set of flippers. 
The goal is to build and launch a Starship completing the game's entire course.
